Interface_name: HTTP client using cURL in PHP
Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP class that generates placeholder images by downloading them from a remote HTTP server using either cURL or file operations, with various customization options.

Class Description: The Image class provides functionality to generate placeholder images with customizable dimensions, categories, formats, and other visual properties. It handles the download process using either cURL or file operations depending on server capabilities.

Attributes:
- BASE_URL: string - Base URL for the placeholder image service
- FORMAT_JPG: string - Constant for JPG format
- FORMAT_JPEG: string - Constant for JPEG format  
- FORMAT_PNG: string - Constant for PNG format
- categories: array - Available image categories

Methods:
- image(
    string|null $dir = null,
    int $width = 640,
    int $height = 480,
    string|null $category = null,
    bool $fullPath = true,
    bool $randomize = true,
    string|null $word = null,
    bool $gray = false,
    string $format = 'png'
  ) -> string|false - Downloads and saves an image with specified parameters, returning the file path or false on failure
- imageUrl(
    int $width,
    int $height,
    string|null $category,
    bool $randomize,
    string|null $word,
    bool $gray,
    string $format
  ) -> string - Generates the URL for the placeholder image (assumed to exist based on reference code)
